Additional Scope Comments: BEP will not use Item 12 (3 years, Temporary) of GRS 6.1, as all employees/positions not considered to be Capstone officials (Item 10, Permanent) will be managed in accordance with Item 11 (Temporary, 7 years).
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be annual, Calendar Year.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer 15 years after cut off (Except for the Chief Technology Officer's (CTO) account).Transfer email records in the CTO's account 25 years after cut off.
Legacy Email Scope: The Bureau will be including legacy email for items 010 and 011, dating back to approximately 2000.  Earlier emails were printed and filed.

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: U.S. Department of Energy/Energy Information Administration (EIA)
Additional Scope Comments: Energy Information Administration is a component of the Department of Energy with its own records  management office. Non-Capstone officials , staff, contractors and other support and/or administrative positions will be managed as temporary email (retained for 7 years) scheduled under  GRS 6.1, item 011 or as temporary email (retained for 3 years) scheduled under GRS 6.1, item 012.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure
Transfer Instructions: Records will be transferred when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: Legacy email is not included in the Capstone categorization, as traditional records management with a print-and-file policy was followed prior to Capstone adoption.

Additional Scope Comments: Non-capstone accounts will be managed according to disposition instructions outlined in GRS6.1 item 011. Emails will be destroyed within the USADF electronic recording-keeping system at the appropriate time.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff will be the end of the employee's tenure.
Transfer Instructions: Agency's Capstone designated employees' emails will be transferred to NARA when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: USADF will include legacy emails dating back to 2013.
